summary: The diff implements the majority of the 13 requirements for the premium home page redesign. Most sections (Hero, Trust Strip, Categories, How It Works, Trending Products, Nearest Centers, Vendor CTA, Testimonials, Footer, Header, conversion elements, SEO) are implemented. A few specific acceptance criteria gaps are identified, particularly around the Footer column naming, and the JSON-LD schema type not matching the requested product listing schema.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer must have five named link columns: About Us, Platform links, For Business, Legal, and Contact Us. The Platform column must list Jewellery, Bridal Sets, Party Wear, Designer Dresses.
missing_requirements.reason: The Footer diff shows FOOTER_LINKS with keys labeled 'Collections' (not 'Platform'), 'For Business', and 'Legal', plus an unnamed brand column. There is no explicit 'About Us' column title. The Platform column is named 'Collections' and includes an extra 'Trending Products' link not in the spec. The five distinct named columns as specified are not clearly present.

missing_requirements.requirement: A JSON-LD script tag with product listing schema for the platform.
missing_requirements.reason: The JSON_LD object in Home.tsx uses '@type': 'WebSite' rather than a product listing schema type such as ItemList or Product. The AC specifies 'product listing schema' specifically.

hallucinated_features.description: Twitter Card meta tags (twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description) were added to the SEO implementation.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-23 only specifies title, description, og:title, og:description, og:image meta tags. Twitter card meta tags were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: The RecentlyBookedToast component cycles through 4 rotating booking notifications rather than just the single specified mock booking.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-22 specifies a single example booking message ('Priya just booked a trial for Bridal Lehenga'). Rotating through multiple different bookings was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: The Footer includes a 'Vendor Dashboard' link in the For Business column.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-21 specifies exactly three For Business links: Become Vendor, Center Login, Partner With Us. 'Vendor Dashboard' was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Center cards in NearestCentersSection include a rating display.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-18 specifies center name, address, number of available products, trial slots available count, and Visit Center button only. A rating display was not in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Trending product cards include star rating and review count display.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-17 specifies image, rental price per day, deposit, center name, Book Trial button, Last Sanitized date, and Most Booked badge. Star ratings and review counts were not requested.
